of house (FOH)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Front of house is used by restaurant staff before, during and after service to help manage bookings, guests and other day-to-day operations.
